name: Bellossom
flavorText:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it
dances, its petals rub together and
make a pleasant ringing sound.

previous.name: Ampharos
previous.flavorText:
The tail's tip
shines brightly
and can be seen from far away. It
acts as a beacon
for lost people.

next.name: Marill
next.flavorText:
The tip of its
tail, which con­
tains oil that is lighter than wa­
ter, lets it swim
without drowning.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.flavorText:
During the day,
it keeps its face
buried in the ground. At night,
it wanders around
sowing its seeds.

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.flavorText:
The fluid that
oozes from its
mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar
that is used to
attract prey.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.flavorText:
It has the world’s largest petals. With every step,
the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

pokemon.name: Bellossom
pokemon.flavorText:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it
dances, its petals rub together and
make a pleasant ringing sound.
